questions.question: An ML engineer is using Amazon SageMaker AI to build and compare binary classification models for a company. The company needs a model that returns results with the fewest possible false positives. Which algorithm and primary model metric should the ML engineer use to select the model to meet these requirements?
options: Use LightGBM as the algorithm. Use precision as the metric.
Use CatBoost as the algorithm. Use recall as the metric.
Use Random Cut Forest (RCF) as the algorithm. Use precision as the metric.
Use DeepAR forecasting as the algorithm. Use recall as the metric.
correct_answers: Use LightGBM as the algorithm. Use precision as the metric.
questions.Practice test: Official Practice Exam: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate (MLA-C01 - English)
